title: Courgette, Tomato and Mozzarella Bake
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 courgettes, sliced', '1 large clove garlic, crushed', '115g mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced', '4 large tomatoes, peeled and sliced', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
